com.cubeia.firebase.bot

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cubeia.firebase.bot.Bot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionListener

    public class Bot
extends Object
implements ConnectionListener
    Basic Bot. A Bot's responses are handled through action (see Action class). The Bot's AI implementation should return proper actions that will be executed by the bot. Created on 2006-sep-26
    Author:
    Fredrik Johansson $RCSFile: $ $Revision: $ $Author: $ $Date: $
